overview: Is there such a thing as Forbidden Temptations? Not in this rule book, in fact, if it's tempting then resistance if futile, especially if it's a handsome boy with a seductive smile, a twinkle in his eye and a hard, throbbing cock! These guys admire and appreciate every inch of each other's toned bodies and take their time as they lick and kiss every inch of flesh before gorging on dick and ass. Smoking hot sexual trysts are the recipe for what makes temptation so irresistible! Nearly two hours of tantalising action!
title: Forbidden Temptations
